review: I got this for the sole purpose of watching Sling TV on my TV. It's good for what it is, but is functionally no better than Roku or AppleTV, unless your goal is to watch Amazon Video. So for Sling TV and Amazon Prime, it's great, but that's it. The physical remote and the need to download specific apps to Fire TV are so last decade. The Fire TV Remote app for Android makes navigating even more difficult than the physical remote. Finding content to watch or listen to is not an easy task. And even if I start watching Amazon video on my phone, I can't easily send it to the TV. Amazon needs to take a cue from Google's Chromecast. And if Sling TV and Amazon Prime worked with Chromecast, I wouldn't have this.
